comments:
Got the following exception when starting the workbench and the Memory View is 
visible.

Looks like getting a selection from the Memory View when the view is restored 
is causing the problem.

!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2005-03-31 15:18:32.161
!MESSAGE Warning: Detected attempt by view org.eclipse.debug.ui.MemoryView to 
create itself recursively (this is probably, but not necessarily, a bug)

Created an attachment (id=19623)
patch to org.eclipse.debug.ui

Getting selection from selection service when the view is created causes the
view to be restored recursively.

To fix problem, avoid getting selection from selection service when restoring
the view.  Instead, the view pane should try to get selection from the view's
local selection provider.

MemoryBlocksTreeViewPane:
* get selection from local selection provider when the view pane is
created/restored.

NewMemoryViewAction:
* set up initial selection for the new view after the view is created.

RenderingViewPane:
* get selection from local selection provider instead of selection service

Darin -
Please apply patch. Thanks...
Samantha
